item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network to attend this blended job fair and networking event sponsored by Mass Networking.

Looking for a job or have one to offer?

Come meet and network with others at this event in Dedham for small businesses, local staffing companies, & others that have jobs to offer

Maybe find your new colleagues or other opportunities here.

It's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013, so come meet and network with other professionals.

Practical Details

  • Bring business cards, resumes, a smile, and a professional attitude
  • Dress code is business casual
  • Appetizers
  • Lots of free parking
  • Free Raffle with Event Tickets plus More Giveaways to Win

Cost and How to Register 

Event fees are $5 prepaid or $8 cash at door if space is available.

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button

to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.

Have All Levels of Software Engineers and other IT positions to offer!  Plus looking for Corporate Controllers, other Accounting, Finance, Restaurant/Hospitality, and More Jobs!
item.name: Hiring For Your Small Business?
